ygData.subject: Re: Wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: I might be going Wisp hunting soon, not sure when or where but I d love to kill a few and hope to find some lightstones to sell.  Hope they will give me exp at
ygData.messageBody:
I might be going Wisp hunting soon, not sure when or where but I'd love to
kill a few and hope to find some lightstones to sell. Hope they will give
me exp at lvl 15 almost 16.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> hmm...wel, seeing as how i haven't killed any wisps in a while...i killed
one at
> 14 with my druid, and got a nosave lightstone...guess they changed it yet
again
> on a later patch.....
>
> (\/)ystik Spellchaser
> lv 38 <got my level tongiht (: *cheers*> cleric of The Rathe
> now...to get lv 39 for rez.....<G>
